item.title: 美国购物者为特朗普关税买单，部分商品价格上涨一倍
item.description: 中国折扣零售应用特卖似乎正在将唐纳德-特朗普的新进口税几乎全部转嫁给美国消费者，一些产品的成本增加了一倍多，此举可能会加剧人们对关税带来的通胀影响的担忧。【原文：Discount Chinese retail app Temu appears to be passing on nearly all of Donald Trump’s new import taxes to US consumers, more than doubling the cost of some products in a move that may add to concern about the inflationary impact of tariffs.】

item.title: 瑞士国家银行再次降低银行获得全额存款利息的限额
item.description: 瑞士国家银行将再次降低即期存款报酬的门槛系数，对银行将现金存放在该机构所赚取的利息进行微调。【原文：The Swiss National Bank will lower the threshold factor for remunerating sight deposits again, making a minor adjustment to how much interest banks earn for parking cash at the institution.】

item.title: DoorDash报价36亿美元后，Deliveroo股价大涨
item.description: Deliveroo Plc 周一股价大涨逾 18%，创 2021 年以来最大涨幅，此前这家英国外卖公司披露了来自 DoorDash 公司的收购要约。【原文：Deliveroo Plc shares surged by more than 18% on Monday, the most since 2021, after the British delivery firm disclosed an acquisition offer from DoorDash Inc.】

item.title: 马来西亚森美兰州的数据中心正在崛起
item.description: 马来西亚森美兰州正在成为一个新的数据中心枢纽，因为柔佛州这个顶级市场正在努力解决数据中心设施对能源和水的大量消耗问题。【原文：Malaysia’s Negeri Sembilan state is emerging as a new hub for data centers as the top market of Johor grapples with the facilities’ voracious consumption of energy and water.】

item.description: 随着石油资源丰富的国家竞相推动人工智能的蓬勃发展，阿拉伯联合酋长国的数据中心开发商 Khazna 正计划在邻国沙特阿拉伯进行大规模扩张。【原文：Khazna, a data center developer in the United Arab Emirates, is planning a major expansion in neighboring Saudi Arabia as the oil-rich nations compete to power the artificial intelligence boom.】

item.title: 石油价格下滑导致债券收益率飙升，安哥拉寻求国际货币基金组织融资
item.description: 安哥拉财政部长说，安哥拉上周与国际货币基金组织就可能的一揽子融资计划举行了会谈，因为贸易战和能源价格下滑实际上将这个石油生产国拒之于国际债券市场之外。【原文：Angola held talks with the International Monetary Fund last week about possible financing packages, its finance minister said, as trade wars and a slump in energy prices effectively shut the oil producer out of international bond markets.】

item.title: 波动的债券将日本人寿保险公司推向一边倒
item.description: 剧烈的波动性和低流动性阻碍了日本人寿保险公司购买更多的国家主权债券，从而加大了收益率上升的压力。【原文：Heightened volatility and low liquidity are deterring Japanese life insurers from buying more of the nation’s sovereign bonds, increasing upward pressure on yields.】

item.title: 加纳央行行长预计 12 月通胀率将降至四年低点
item.description: 加纳央行行长预测，在货币当局提高借贷成本以及约翰-马哈马总统的新政府削减开支之后，非洲最大黄金生产国的通货膨胀将进一步放缓。【原文：Ghana’s central bank chief forecasts inflation in Africa’s biggest gold producer will slow further after the monetary authority raised borrowing costs and as the new government of President John Mahama cuts spending.】

item.title: 维勒鲁瓦称欧洲央行仍有逐步降息的余地
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，欧洲中央银行还有降低借贷成本的空间。【原文：The European Central Bank has room to lower borrowing costs, according to Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau.】

item.description: Jera Co. 公司正在考虑参与阿拉斯加的液化天然气出口项目，这是日本与美国谈判贸易协议努力的一部分。【原文：Jera Co. is considering participating in a proposed liquefied natural gas export project in Alaska, as part of Japan’s efforts to negotiate a trade deal with the US.】

item.title: 黎巴嫩希望在数月内与国际货币基金组织达成初步协议
item.description: 黎巴嫩经济部长表示，黎巴嫩可能会在几个月内与国际货币基金组织签署一份所谓的员工级协议，这一步骤将为这个饱受战争蹂躏的国家的一揽子融资计划谈判铺平道路。【原文：Lebanon may be able to sign a so-called staff-level agreement with the International Monetary Fund within months, according to its economy minister, a step that would pave the way for talks over a funding package for the war-ravaged nation.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯自 2020 年以来吸引的外国直接投资最少
item.description: 2024 年，沙特阿拉伯的外国直接投资流入量连续第三年下降，这表明沙特在吸引海外投资者方面仍面临挑战。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s foreign direct investment inflows fell for a third straight year in 2024, in a sign the kingdom continues to face challenges in attracting overseas investors.】

item.title: Dymon 聘请前千禧年投资组合经理 Shao 进行扩张
item.description: 戴蒙亚洲资本（Dymon Asia Capital）聘请了前千禧管理公司（Millennium Management）投资组合经理邵颖，以扩大相对价值股票交易。【原文：Dymon Asia Capital hired former Millennium Management portfolio manager Shao Ying, as it expands relative-value equity trading.】

item.title: 日本股市因关税平息而上涨，丰田汽车因收购报告而大涨
item.description: 由于贸易谈判取得进展以及日元略微走软，刺激了风险偏好，日本股市升至唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）宣布所谓的互惠关税之前从未有过的水平。【原文：Japan’s shares rose to levels not seen since before Donald Trump’s so-called reciprocal tariff announcement, as progress in trade talks and a slightly weaker yen fueled risk appetite.】

item.title: 全球基金扭转本月从印度股市流出的趋势
item.description: 4 月份，外国投资者成为印度股票的净买家，扭转了月初的下跌趋势，因为他们押注当地市场将相对不受美国关税的影响。【原文：Foreign investors have turned into net buyers of Indian stocks in April, reversing a selloff earlier in the month, amid bets that the local market will remain relatively insulated from the impact of US tariffs.】

item.title: 曾是金融科技明星的英国股权众筹陷入困境
item.description: 股权众筹曾是金融科技最热门的趋势之一，它让数百万散户投资者有机会通过持有欧洲最热门初创企业的股份而淘金。如今，这一行业似乎失去了光彩，越来越少的公司利用它来筹集资金，而不断下挫的估值也让一些早期支持者尝到了苦果。【原文：Once one of fintech’s hottest trends, equity crowdfunding gave millions of retail investors a chance to strike gold by owning a stake in Europe’s buzziest startups. These days the sector seems to have lost its sparkle, with fewer companies using it to raise cash and sinking valuations leaving some early backers with a bitter taste.】

item.title: 新加坡金管局称：旷日持久的贸易战可能进一步拖累新加坡经济增长

item.title: 恒瑞医药获中国监管机构批准出售香港股票
